docs.lead_paragraph: A warplane probably belonging to the Syrian air force crashed on the Turkish side of the border with Syria on Saturday and the pilots appeared to have bailed out, a local Turkish governor was quoted as saying.

headline.main: Turkey Says Warplane, Probably Syrian, Crashed Near Border
headline.print_headline: Turkey Says Warplane, Probably Syrian, Crashed Near Border

docs.snippet: A warplane probably belonging to the Syrian air force crashed on the Turkish side of the border with Syria on Saturday and the pilots appeared to have bailed out, a local Turkish governor was quoted as saying....

docs.lead_paragraph: Drugmakers Sanofi and Regeneron said on Saturday results from a one-year test of their Dupixent product aimed at adults with eczema or moderate-to-severe atopic dermatitis (AD) had been positive.

docs.lead_paragraph: Embattled French presidential candidate Francois Fillon was under growing pressure to quit the race on Saturday as his party leaders brought forward a meeting to discuss the situation and former allies shied away from a planned rally to support him.

docs.lead_paragraph: A New York man repeatedly traveled to the Middle East to try to join the Islamic State or another extremist group in Syria and later told authorities he'd been prepared to strap on a bomb to sacrifice himself for jihad, prosecutors said Saturday.

docs.lead_paragraph: In a major diplomatic break after the assassination of the half brother of North Korea’s leader, the Malaysian government declared Ambassador Kang Chol “persona non grata.”
